snippet: Minneapolis family needs a full-time nanny. Must love kids! Our ideal match will meet the requirements below. Please be willing to do light housekeeping...
teaser: Minneapolis family needs a full-time nanny. Must love kids! Our ideal match will meet the requirements below. Please be willing to do light housekeeping. Seeking someone to handle meal preparation. We require that you have your own car. We'll also need some laundry help, too. And we'll need you to handle groceries or errands every so often. Please be a fan of outdoor activities. We'd like someone who enjoys playing games with our kids. Looking to hire someone who encourages reading. Bonus points if you're interested in music or the dramatic arts. Arts and crafts lovers are strongly encouraged to apply! Looking for someone who loves sports.
jobtitle: Nanny Needed For 2 Children In Minneapolis
